input.sentences: today was a sad day as we laid our brother to rest .
his coffin was brought in by family members .
the sadness on everyones face was noticeable . not much was said .
people told stories as the army guarded his casket .
the grieving mother had to be calmed down several times . a truly sad day .
output.sentences: The man was sad as his brother was laid to rest.
The family gathered around as the coffin was brought through the streets.
People told stories about the brother's life.
The times were sad for the mother.
